timeline.bodyText: Should not circuit breaker entries (SOLR-14588 and SOLR-14615) be added here?
timeline.author: atris
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -35,113 +35,13 @@ Consult the lucene/CHANGES.txt file for additional, low level, changes in this r
 
 New Features
 ---------------------
+
 * SOLR-14151 Make schema components load from packages (noble)
 
 * SOLR-14588: Introduce Circuit Breaker Infrastructure and a JVM heap usage memory tracking circuit breaker implementation (Atri Sharma)
 
 * SOLR-14615: CPU Utilization Based Circuit Breaker (Atri Sharma)
 
-Improvements
-----------------------
-* LUCENE-8984: MoreLikeThis MLT is biased for uncommon fields (Andy Hind via Anshum Gupta)
-
